description: The Jolly Pig is about delicious food, made fresh, from scratch, and with local ingredients. Try our original Korean Pulled Pork BBQ Taco! We prepare our unique dishes with care and finesse!Our mission is to provide healthy, delicious, and fresh culinary treats from the best ingredients available, with creativity, and flair!Ranked the #1 Food Truck in Baltimore by The Baltimore Sun's weekly the "B" in 2012! We are bringing delicious, fresh, scratch-cooking to the streets! Our unique and creative offerings are just the thing to alleviate those lunchtime doldrums! Catch us roaming the roads in Baltimore City and Baltimore County.And - it's a cool way to throw a party, too! We do company picnics, birthday and graduation parties, showers- any reason is a good reason to have a party!their special recipes to you- literally. Look for the pink and white food truck in your neighborhood.
name: The Jolly Pig
